entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Run and fix #52953
  • GRPC Server causing Microsoft.AspNetCore.Connections.ConnectionResetException when listening to IPAddress.Any #52952
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudAddProduct #52951
  • Perf improvement: mvc #52950
  • Blazor Web project with Auth does not correctly configure Logout service #52948
  • Hot reload .cshtml not working in IIS #52946
  • Perf regression: plainTextEmptyFilter #52941
  • HttpContext.AuthenticateAsync do not return "sub" claim after update to .NET 8 #52940
  • UserManager.IsInRoleAsync(user, "rolename") still shows user in role after deleting role. #52939
  • property delcared with [TempData] does not work together with RedirectToPage if it contains date value #52938

Closed

  • Proposal for UI-Driven Type Refactoring Tool Using Tag #52922
  • Call JS checkValidity() from Blazor EditForm - Get ElementReference for EditForm #52902
  • Blazor WASM deployment to AWS S3 was working now failing with "Failed to find a valid digest in the 'integrity' attribute for resource" #52942
  • Tool for tracking changes by Blazor #49867
    Backlog
  • Simpler empty Blazor templates #43265
  • Can't debug Blazor app in Teams #30898
    Planning: WebUI
  • Blazor Webassembly Client debug not working when running on Local Service Fabric cluster #28649
    Planning: WebUI
  • IIS Express server for hosted Blazor app fails to launch with custom environment variable #30422
    Planning: WebUI
  • Better error log for: "No .NET call dispatcher has been set." #48164
    Planning: WebUI
  • Component with incorrect parameter name emits no warning / error #45667
    Planning: WebUI
  • Better error message when SignalR message size limit exceeded #32360
    Planning: WebUI
  • When specifying non-existing event for data binding to bind to, unhandled exception is thrown #28804
    Planning: WebUI
  • Add a modal \ overlay component #23319
    Planning: WebUI
  • Make it easier to debug System.ArgumentException: There is no tracked object with id 'xx'. Perhaps the DotNetObjectReference instance was already disposed #30878
    Planning: WebUI
  • Application.DispatcherUnhandledException alternative in Blazor #43454
    Planning: WebUI
  • Allow more oidc-client options to be set in OidcProviderOptions for Blazor wasm authentication. #36028
    Planning: WebUI
  • [Blazor WASM] Expose NotifyAuthenticationStateChanged on the AuthenticationStateProvider #21669
    Planning: WebUI
  • [Blazor] Nested Components with inner partial classes (not child components) #20765
    Planning: WebUI
  • Build Error in Azure Pipeline when Building Blazor Project with MSBuild in Blazor WebAssembly Mode #52898
  • Blazor AOT Publish For Webassembly Hosted Application NET8.0 #52905
  • Support for Blazor Events in Blazor SSR. #52919
  • InteractiveServer with prerender incorrectly waits for the completion of OnInitializedAsync #52926
  • Post request does not render end state of components on SSR page #52871
    8.0.x
  • Incorrect child component content is rendered with static SSR or prerendering on server #52131
    8.0.x
  • Perf improvement: plaintext #52773
  • Support AsyncPageable for Blazor ItemsProviderRequest #52282
  • QuickGrid in Blazor Server .Net 8 Not available #52463
  • blazor WebAssembly does not run normally #52721

PullRequests

Created

  • Force Logout API to get SignInManager from services #52949
    area-mvc
  • [release/8.0] Fix SSR page rendering intermediate state instead of the end state of components #52943
    Servicing-consider, area-blazor, 8.0.x

Merged

  • Fix SSR page rendering intermediate state instead of the end state of components #52823
    area-blazor, 9.0-preview1
  • Un-quarantine `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.E2ETests.ServerRenderingTests.InteractivityTest.AutoRenderMode_UsesBlazorServerOnFirstLoad_ThenWebAssemblyOnSuccessiveLoads` #51887
    area-infrastructure, area-blazor, pending-ci-rerun, 9.0-preview1

Updated

  • [Infrastructure] Move back to NPM #52914
    area-infrastructure
  • Add explicit null checks on ObjectPool.Return rather than triggering random failures later on #52935
    area-networking
  • [release/8.0] Fix NavigationManager.Refresh() on SSR-only pages #52767
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0] Fix Blazor enhanced form bugs #52765
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0.x
